alert.note: Alert for Chaves; De Baca (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 6:30PM MDT until August 29 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern De Baca County in east central New Mexico... North central Chaves County in southeastern New Mexico... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 629 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Yeso, or 20 miles southwest of Fort Sumner, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Yeso and Mesa. This includes the following highways... Highway 285 between Mile Markers 147 and 168. Highway 60 between Mile Markers 303 and 314. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
